oai_dc:dc.dc:title: [Captain C. A. Goodwin]

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soldiers; Portrait photographs; Military uniforms; Military officers
Tennessee - History - Civil War, 1861-1865; United States - History - Civil War, 1861-1865
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Full-length portrait of a Federal captain in uniform. His arms are folded and he wears a kepi.

This is possibly Carlton A. Goodwin, who served with the 11th Indiana Cavalry Regiment. Federal Brevet Brigadier General Gilbert Motier Lafayette Johnson, commander of the 13th Indiana Cavalry, had numerous cartes de visite of fellow men-in-arms among his papers; only a few are identified.
